attributes.action: ban content unsuitable for children on all TV & Radio News broadcasts before 9 o'clock at night
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's high time our children were properly protected from an unscrupulous media.

There can be no justification for the ritual desensitisation our children are exposed to on a daily basis. It is, in part, contributory to the enormous levels of cognitive dissonance in the world today.

Do the children (or us for that matter) really need to know about murder and pillage and rape? All it does is inbreed a sense that it is not safe out there and ultimately diminishes confidence and energy.
